body: Hi Joyce, 1. Make sure you have GHPython installed on your system and is unblocked. Read this discussion carefully([http://www.grasshopper3d.com/group/ladybug/forum/topics/ladybug-ins...](http://www.grasshopper3d.com/group/ladybug/forum/topics/ladybug-installation-problems)). 2. Check the attached file for Hong Kong's sunpath. There are a number of tutorials on sunpath if you google for Ladybug sunpath which should help you to get started. The one that I recorded is pretty old and the component has changed meanwhile. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/ZAWmPnMuulnf01YJKvGOIBewaFLuwJw0QedphCcWrOgYoQ2cgSd7axW-jF1enuHTc3t1V1RfMUqSIMeSc*3P-2LsEl2AD8TU/HongKong_Sunpath.png)
